00001 #include <num.h>
00002 
00003 static char tod[1024];
00004 
00005 char *
00006 get_tod(tw_stime ts)
00007 {
00008         int time = (int) ts % TWENTY_FOUR_HOURS;
00009         int d = (int) ts / TWENTY_FOUR_HOURS;;
00010         int h = time / 3600;
00011         int m = (time % 3600) / 60;
00012         double s = ts - (d * 86400) - (h * 3600) - (m * 60);
00013         
00014         sprintf(tod, "D%d %02d:%02d:%02.4lf", d, h, m, s);
00015 
00016         return tod;
00017 }
